column7: Intensive professional training in movement and stage combat for the actor. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. 2 graduate hours. No professional credit. May be repeated to a maximum of 12 hours. Prerequisite: Enrollment limited to graduate acting students; concurrent registration in THEA 571, THEA 572 and THEA 574.
